description: Add chip/pill component for selectable tags
context:
Beads description:
## Summary
Add a chip/pill component for displaying selectable tags, categories, or filter options. Similar to Material Design chips or filter pills.

## Requirements
- Pill/rounded shape styling
- Support for icon + text (icon optional)
- Selected vs unselected states (selected = filled/primary color, unselected = ghost/outline)
- Works well inside `.cluster` layout for horizontal wrapping groups
- Light and dark theme support

## Visual Reference
Rounded rectangular elements with:
- Icons on the left (optional)
- Text label
- Clear selected state (blue fill + border) vs unselected (gray outline)

## Implementation Notes
- Use `.chip` as the base class
- Consider `.chip.selected` or using `aria-pressed="true"` for selected state
- Demo should use icons from https://phosphoricons.com/
- Demo should show a category/skill selector similar to the reference image (Technology categories like Front-End Development, Back-End Development, etc.)
